DataElement.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco.  This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)_External factor or agent subjection to which causes a disease

(NCI)
